name: Flow (itch) (ChiefCloudyEye)
description:
Flow is a platformer game focusing on real time fluid simulations. You play as a radioactive mass that has become sentient, and wishes to leave the sewers to see the world. 

Currently there only a few levels, but Flow has a time based leader board, so you can have fun speedrunning, or just trying to beat your friends.

Your color will change each time you die, but restarting the game will save your color and progress.

Controls:

Restart Level: R

Restart All: Shift + R

Slow Motion: R

Jump: Space

Move: A|D

Exit Level: Escape

Exit Game: Escape
